captions: we observe here a seismic image of continuous horizontal reflections.
this image represents a seismic model of a parallel-laminated unit.
a seismic model. There are continuous horizontal reflections.
this image demonstrates a model with a horizontally layered sequence.
we see here a 2D section. It is a laterally uniform bedding.
we see here a subsurface model. It has an uniform layering pattern.
a seismic model of a concordant seismic layering.
